title: The Weather map
creator_credit: Christopher Cordeaux, Malcolm Otton and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Explains how to interpret a weather map and how the Bureau produces it daily from the information collected by stations throughout Australia. Aimed at upper primary-, lower high school-aged students.
creator_credit_for_label: Christopher Cordeaux, Malcolm Otton and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
